comments.text: I want to know which bugs some given user attached patches to in the last X days. But boolean charts only have "attachment creator" and "attachment is patch" available. It should also contain "attachment creation date".
comments.author: LpSolit@gmail.com
comments.creator: LpSolit@gmail.com
